specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Pleated Pleating is a heat-setting technique where fabric is placed between a two-part mould and placed inside a steaming machine.
specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Yarn Effect > High Twist Yarn High twist yarn is made by tightly twisting staple fibers or filament yarns, resulting in a higher number of twists per unit length. It adds texture, a crisp feeling, and a cool touch to the fabric. Appearance > Crinkled
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Plain > Georgette This fabric can easily build up static electricity, especially in dry conditions. To prevent this, make sure the air has enough moisture. Mechanical > Pleated To prevent the pleated fabric from losing its wrinkles, we discourage ironing and rolling the fabric. Fold and store it instead.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Do not iron Recommended Use Dresses, Blouses
